branchCategory.name: XT
branchCategory.description: <P>SMC's non-contact, cyclone and Bernoulli&nbsp;type&nbsp;grippers, series XT661 moves work pieces without leaving flaws or adsorption marks.&nbsp; Because no-contact is made with work pieces, the XT661 is ideal for transferring FPD glass substrates, solar cells, wafers, etc.</P>
